column1:
share on x more memories... memorial service. jun 24. 10:00 am christ united methodist church505 byron plantation rd. albany, ga, usget order flowers now for renee elizabeth's memorial service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe kimbrell-stern funeral directors website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for renee elizabeth's memorial service cemetery details. crown hill cemetery1907 dawson rd. albany, ga, us, 31707. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of mrs. renee elizabeth rich holton send comfort to the holton family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! nr nancy reimer. jun 21 at 12:30 pm i can still see renee in her desk in my class in 8th grade! she rode with me one night to a class supper, and i still remember her smile and laugh. my heart is aching for all of this family as we were once neighbors on dawson road and mrs. rich (renee's grandmother) was our only childhood babysitter! thoughts and prayers to this special family. i am sorry i will be in ohio this week and cannot attend the service. comment share comment share facebook twitter
